metadata.title: CVE-2024-26781 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:

locking dependencydetected 6.8.0-rc4-syzkaller-00212-g40b9385dd8e6 #0 Not taintedsyz-executor.2/24141 is trying to acquire lock: ffff888045870130(k-sk_lock-AF_INET6){+.+.}-{0:0}, at:     Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
